segments.text: What sights are included on the tour ? Is the entire time spent in Paris ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of the major sights are included . You'll visit the Louvre , the Eiffel Tower and all of the top museums . You'll also take a day trip out of Paris to Versailles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you fax a copy of the tour itinerary to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Just give me your fax number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . I'll fax the itinerary to you immediately .
segments.speaker: S2
